title: The Business world: EURODISNEYLAND CASE ANALYSIS
description:
EURODISNEYLAND CASE ANALYSIS: Strengths and weaknesses of DisneyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s approach at Euro Disneyland

Introduction:
There were high expectation from Euro Disneyland. The Disney Management was too optimistic about their Euro project due to their previous operational successes in Anaheim, Orlando and Tokyo theme parks. Things did not go well in Euro Disneyland. Therefore, analysis on DisneyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s approaches in euro Disneyland is very important in understanding the right way of internationalization of companies and their subsidiaries. DisneyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s approaches may be strong or weak for a desired outcome in different nations. This is because factors such as organisation and management, globalisation, cultural differences, motivational and leadership affects the performance and success of the company and its subsidiary. These factors, in itself are affected by other factors such as People, which is groups and individuals, and the surrounding environment at large. Further analysis of the approaches will give us a broader picture
